errors.error_description: The README recommends an outdated version of matplotlib (2.x), which may cause compatibility issues with modern features of the library or other dependencies.
correction_candidates: The text should be `The package requires numpy, scipy, and matplotlib (version 3.0 or newer)`.
The version constraint is not necessary and should be removed. The sentence should be `The package requires numpy, scipy, and matplotlib.`
The text should be `The package requires numpy, scipy, and matplotlib (any version is fine).`
The text should be `The package requires numpy, scipy, and matplotlib (version 2.x is mandatory).`
errors.golden_answer: The version constraint is not necessary and should be removed. The sentence should be `The package requires numpy, scipy, and matplotlib.`

errors.error_description: The `git clone` command provides an incorrect URL for the source code repository, which will result in a 'repository not found' error.
correction_candidates: The protocol should be SSH: `git clone git@github.com:python-control/python-control.git`.
The repository name is wrong, it should be `python_control`: `git clone https://github.com/python-control/python_control.git`.
